#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;


int main()
{int n,sum=0,m,count =0;

scanf("%d",&n);
//printf("%d",(int)log2(15));

while(n>=1)
{
        n-=(int)pow(2.0,(int)log2(n));
        count++;
        
}
      printf("%d",count);
    
        
    system("pause");
    return 0;
    
}
